title: Love Letters: 54 Letters Inspired by Love
description: Love Letters takes you deep into the heart of God. Given and inspired by the Holy Spirit, the words are filled with His love towards you. Instructed to share, Love Letters expresses God's unconditional love towards you and encourages you to share it with the world. Love Letters will speak peace, happiness and purpose into your life. Without question, you will be inspired by these letters. With an open heart, you will discover your identity and most importantly, know Love.
author: E'yen A. Gardner
